summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Tuesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 14
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were higher on Tuesday, with 15 gaining and the other four declining.
Bitcoin rose 3.3% to $25,152 by market close.
